channel.title: xylem | Gordon Beeming
channel.description: Gordon Beeming - Father • Husband • Triathlete • SSW Solution Architect

item.title: Activating your Windows 10
item.description: So you shouldn't need to do this but in my case for some reason I needed to activate windows after performing and upgrade from Windows 8.1.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Changing the theme in Windows 10
item.description: In windows 10 when you go to Change the background and colors on Start
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Cleaning up the Taskbar on Windows 10
item.description: The number 1 thing voted for under Taskbar currently is to hide the new Search bar and task view buttons
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Browsing localhost with the Microsoft Edge Browser
item.description: So if you using windows 10 and doing some web development you would probably have noticed that you can't browse localhost for some reason. And there is a couple of feedback items for it in the Windows Feedback app.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
